Title: Just after leaving the line of fire once more entering the battlefield
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: The text on the wall poster the soldier is holding:祖国江山万代红 (The motherland will be red for ten thousand generations)根批林彪"克己复礼"的反动纲页 (Ruthlessly criticize Lin Biao's "restrain yourself and return to the rites" reactionary program)
Theme: People's Liberation ArmyCriticize Lin Biao and Confucius (1974)
